pivot.wtk
Class Button

java.lang.Object
  pivot.wtk.Component
      pivot.wtk.Button
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConstrainedVisual, Visual
Direct Known Subclasses:
CalendarButton, Checkbox, LinkButton, ListButton, Menu.Item, MenuBar.Item, MenuButton, PushButton, RadioButton, TerraAccordionSkin.PanelHeader, TerraCalendarSkin.DateButton, TerraPanoramaSkin.ScrollButton, TerraTabPaneSkin.TabButton
public abstract class Button
extends Component

Abstract base class for button components. TODO Ensure that button group names are unique across applications? Applets downloaded from different domains won't clash, but multiple instances of the same application from the same domain would. Put the groups in the application context? TODO Allow callers to remove a button group (possibly by exposing group dictionary interface).

Author:
gbrown

Returns:
The button's action, or null if no action is defined.

Sets this button's action.

Parameters:

Sets this button's action.

Parameters:
actionID - The ID of the action to be triggered when this button is pressed.
Throws:
